definition: one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
attempting nothing and accomplishing nothing (idiom); without any initiative or drive/feckless
to accomplish much/to have good prospects/to have a promising future
nonfeasance/omission (law)

sentences.english: But as a local born and bred Liverpudlian person.
sentences.chinese: 但作为一名土生土长的利物浦人。

sentences.english: Afghanistan's Second Vice President Abdul Karim Khalili was present at the meeting as guest of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗第二副总统哈利利作为东道国客人出席会议。

sentences.english: A cultural icon, he is widely known by the single name Elvis.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个文化符号，他的名字埃尔维斯也广为人知。

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作为个人，对这种人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: But it has exploded in popularity, as this stage is the most vulnerable for the mayfly .
sentences.chinese: 但爆炸的人气，作为现阶段最脆弱的蜉蝣。

sentences.english: We allow one percent for leakage.
sentences.chinese: 我们少算百分之一作为漏损。

sentences.english: Use this as a template to enumerate each secure page.
sentences.chinese: 将这作为枚举每个安全页面的模板。

sentences.english: Project-based ecosystem services accounting has its limitations, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而作为项目基础的生态系统服务会计有其局限性。

sentences.english: The serum MBP and moisture in brain tissues were observed as index.
sentences.chinese: 以血清MBP和脑组织含水量作为观察指标。

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 总理委派外交部长作为他的代表。

sentences.english: As a Bodhisattva, he would usually be standing, and dressed in jewels.
sentences.chinese: 作为一位菩萨，他通常是站立着，穿戴着宝石。

sentences.english: Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韦丹塔界定真正作为常任理事国和虚幻是暂时的。

sentences.english: As a developer, this is what you should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 这就是作为一个开发人员所需要追求的。

sentences.english: It suggested that SM could be regarded as a good exogenous scavenger of oxygen free radical.
sentences.chinese: 提示丹参可作为一良好的外源性氧自由基清除剂。

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 场景从17世纪景观作为田园场景复制画。

definition: to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to become/to turn into
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
same/equal/equivalent
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
old variant of 和[he2]/harmonious
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
old variant of 和[he2]
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
is both ...(and...)/since/as/being the case that
surname Ye
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
thus/consequently/as a result
but/however
